column5: Hello Forum,  As a proud father of a 2year old, I would like to share our outing to Bass Pro Shops the other day, of my son trying out a few bait cast reels, before he liked one and handed it over to me. It was also easy for me to further teach him the different species of fish in their massive huge honey hole. Proud father excited for the days and years too come, When he shouts out " Daddy, Fish On ! "
Great place for the kids and even a better excuse to go shopping !!!
You are a lucky man! I didn't know what a baitcaster was until last year. LOL
